participant_2.background:
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.
My favorite thing about my last vacation was eating at the local restaurants.
I love my family, but my pets are my best friends.
I went to a farm and met a lot of baby animals on my last vacation.
I prefer to live in the suburbs, where I can enjoy my country music without having to worry about disturbing anyone.

content.text: I've been too busy with my hobbies to think about school.
That's the best way to live life! What are your hobbies?
I'm a single man who enjoys driving my SUV and eating jello.
Sounds like a fun time! I love driving and eating too.
I rode my motorcycle across the country last year.
Oh wow! That's amazing! I wish I could do something like that.
I've been on the tv news six times.
Really? What were you on the news for?
I've been in a few situations where I've felt threatened because of my sexuality, and the news has been there to cover it.
I'm sorry to hear that you've had to go through that. I'm glad that the news has been there to help you out.
Thanks. I'm just trying to live my life and be happy.
That's all you can do! I'm sure you're doing a great job.
